description: A simple game in which you try to guess as many words as you can in a row based on a crossword-style clue.
title: Word Game

description: For this project, I worked in a team to build this tool to simulate managing a stock portfolio for a family, or small group.
title: Family Financial

description: A simple desktop app, based on the calculator desk accessory from classic Mac OS.
title: Classic Calculator

description: A web app to provide the user with a random journaling prompt.
title: Mindfulness Prompts

description: My least favorite thing to do in CSS is to create drop shadows, so I wrote this small web app to generate the code for me.
title: CSS Shadow Tool
